Package es.uam.eps.sadp.grants

Interface CCGG

  • public interface CCGG
    This is the City Council Grants Gateway interface Use static method getGateway to obtain the gateway proxy

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Double getAmountGranted​(String id)
      Get granted amount Note: For testing, you can assume that all projects that request between 1000€ and a million are going to be funded, and that the minimum time to solve a request is 1 day, and the maximum 7 days
      static CCGG getGateway()  
      void setDate​(LocalDate date)
      Use the setDate method to simulate dates and simplify testing.
      String submitRequest​(GrantRequest request)  
      void testIOException​(int times, boolean withException)
      This method allows to simulate IOExceptions to simplify unit testing.

    • Method Detail

      • submitRequest

        String submitRequest​(GrantRequest request)
              throws IOException,
                     InvalidRequestException
        Parameters:
        request - Please note that all fields are compulsory
        Returns:
        Follow Up ID
        Throws:
        IOException - if there are communication problems
        InvalidRequestException - if GrantRequest is not correct

      • getAmountGranted

        Double getAmountGranted​(String id)
                 throws IOException,
                        InvalidIDException
        Get granted amount Note: For testing, you can assume that all projects that request between 1000€ and a million are going to be funded, and that the minimum time to solve a request is 1 day, and the maximum 7 days
        Parameters:
        id - Follow Up ID
        Returns:
        Granted amount (0 if not granted). null for pending projects
        Throws:
        IOException - if there are communication problems
        InvalidIDException - if id is not correct

      • setDate

        void setDate​(LocalDate date)
        Use the setDate method to simulate dates and simplify testing. Do not use it in production!!
        Parameters:
        date - The CCGG will use it as the current date for all subsequent requests If null, the CCGG will use the system current date for subsequent requests

      • testIOException

        void testIOException​(int times,
                     boolean withException)
        This method allows to simulate IOExceptions to simplify unit testing. Do not use it in production!!
        Parameters:
        times - number of next times calls to getAmountGranted or submitRequest
        withException - produce or not IOException

      • getGateway

        static CCGG getGateway()
        Returns:
        CCGG proxy
